regen.absent_element: restriction on non-simultaneous operation of modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode is active at any given time within the Operations State, preventing simultaneous operation of multiple modes.

regen.absent_element: the constraint that modes cannot run simultaneously
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode among normal, training, and maintenance is active at any time.

regen.absent_element: constraint to prevent simultaneous operation of modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that no two or more modes (normal, training, and maintenance) within the Operations State are activated at the same time.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
